member.name: CIEXYZ
member.summary: The CIEXYZ structure contains the x,y, and z coordinates of a specific color in a specified color space.

member.name: CIEXYZ.ciexyzX
member.summary: The x coordinate in fix point (2.30).

member.name: CIEXYZ.ciexyzY
member.summary: The y coordinate in fix point (2.30).

member.name: CIEXYZ.ciexyzZ
member.summary: The z coordinate in fix point (2.30).
